description: Try our easy to follow No-Bread Burger recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: No-Bread Burger Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a spiraliser or mandolin, shred sweet potato into long thin strips and place into a bowl. Add egg and flour. Stir well to combine. Form 1/2-cups of mixture into 8 patties and place onto a tray.

Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Heat 1 tbs oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook sweet potato patties for 3 minutes each side until golden and cooked through. Transfer to tray and place in oven to keep warm.

Heat remaining oil in pan. Cook mushrooms for 4 minutes each side or until golden and soft. Transfer mushrooms to tray and top each with a cheese slice. Place in oven to keep warm and melt cheese. Add onion to pan and cook for 5 minutes or until soft.
Place a pattie onto each plate and spread with aioli. Top with lettuce, tomato, mushroom, onion, avocado and remaining patties, to serve.
